title: Deputies: 7-year-old accidentally shot after gun found in NC woods
content:
RUTHERFORD COUNTY, N.C. —
A 7-year-old girl was taken to the hospital after being accidentally shot by another juvenile in some North Carolina woods Wednesday, deputies said.
The incident was reported around 3:45 p.m. near Rutherfordton about 50 miles southeast of Asheville. The girl was shot in the buttocks and taken to a hospital in Spartanburg, S.C.
Rutherford County deputies said the victim and three other juveniles found a gun inside a backpack in a wooded area near the victim's home. The other juveniles included two family members and a neighbor friend.
When one of the juveniles pulled out the gun, the victim was accidentally shot, deputies said.
Rutherford County deputies and county Department of Social Services officials are handling the investigation.
